titles.title: Yakuza to Metsuki no Warui Onna Keiji no Hanashi
A Story About a Yakuza and a Detective With a Stern Face
ヤクザと目つきの悪い女刑事の話

title: Yakuza to Metsuki no Warui Onna Keiji no Hanashi
title_japanese: ヤクザと目つきの悪い女刑事の話
title_synonyms: A Story About a Yakuza and a Detective With a Stern Face
synopsis:
Todoroki, an underboss of the underground syndicate "Tsuchigumo", and Arigaya, a detective of the 4th police division, are constantly at each others throats. But although the two are on opposite sides of the law, they're both actually madly in love with one another! Can love even flourish between a Yakuza and a Cop? Yakuza to Metsuki no Warui Onna Keiji no Hanashi is a hilarious romcom between two unsuspecting prisoners of love as they navigate their way through the stakeouts and sting operations of a love you would've least expected!

(Source: Irodori Comics)
background: Yakuza to Metsuki no Warui Onna Keiji no Hanashi is a web manga released on the author's Twitter and pixiv accounts since July 5, 2019, and published in print by Kadokawa since May 14, 2021. The series has been published as doujinshi since November 24, 2019, when the first volume was released at COMITIA 130. The doujinshi series has been published digitally in English as Arrested Love by Irodori Comics since July 31, 2020.
